OpenProject 6.1.3

This patch release contains an important bug fix. We recommend to update your OpenProject installation to this version.

Bug fixes (1)

  • Users who have multiple roles which grant the “View work packages” permission could not view all work packages in a project (#24509). This error has been fixed.

For further information on the release, please refer to the Changelog v.6.1.3 or take a look at GitHub.
